item.title: Chinna Thayaval: Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This sad song is also from the movie Thalapathy. Just like Sundari Kannal oru Sethi and Yamunai Atrile. (Thanks to my dad for corrections.) In this movie, RajaniÂ´s character was abandoned on a train by his mum as a baby.

item.title: Malarnthum Malaraatha Lyrics and Translation
item.description: This song is a classic. It is from a movie called Paasa Malar (flower or affection). I grew up listening to lots of oldies and enjoyed their high lyricism.
